item.title: This crossing over the drainage ditch is dangerous and confusing. It should be taken away as there is a safer one just a few meters further to the left. Problem Identified 22-12-2025. The damaged stile is one field further over the drainage along the footpath., 22nd December
item.description:
Drainage crossing: Perch-insolvent-casually Stile damage: decorate-overheard-furnish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement parking, 22nd December
item.description:
Bromford social housing residents from shurdington main road Causing obstructions from two residents parking commercial vehicles on path overnight when they have allocated car park available on path surrounding their car park, emergency vehicles cant access the 7 private houses in hillview gardens and people have to walk in the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Hillview Gardens, Shurdington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
